item.title: GS-DiT: Advancing Video Generation with Pseudo 4D Gaussian Fields through Efficient Dense 3D Point Tracking
item.description: GS-DiT: Generating high-quality videos with advanced 4D control through efficient dense 3D point tracking and pseudo 4D Gaussian fields.
